dshuds.metadata.Name: §3Dynamic Surroundings: HUDs
dshuds.metadata.Description: The various HUDs from Dynamic Surroundings
dshuds.keybind.msg.LLSafeBlocks: 亮度等級隱藏安全區域%s
config.dshuds.logging.tooltip: Defines how Dynamic Surroundings: HUDs logging will behave
config.dshuds.logging.enableLogging.tool: Enables/disables debug logging of the mod
config.dshuds.logging.enableVersionCheck: Enables/disables display of version check information
config.dshuds.logging.chatnotices.toolti: Toggles display of Dynamic Surroundings chat notices
config.dshuds.potionhud.tooltip: Options for the Potion HUD overlay
config.dshuds.potionhud.nohud.tooltip: Disables Vanilla and Dynamic Surroundings potion HUD
config.dshuds.potionhud.enable.tooltip: Enable/disable display of potion icons in display
config.dshuds.potionhud.transparency.too: Transparency factor for icons (higher more solid)
config.dshuds.potionhud.leftoffset.toolt: Offset from left side of screen
config.dshuds.potionhud.scale.tooltip: Size scale of icons (lower is smaller)
config.dshuds.potionhud.location.tooltip: Area of the display the Potion HUD is displayed (0 upper left, 1 upper right)
config.dshuds.lightlevelhud.tooltip: Options for configuring the Light Level HUD
config.dshuds.lightlevelhud.range.toolti: Block range for light level analysis
config.dshuds.lightlevelhud.mobspawnthre: Light level at which mobs can spawn
config.dshuds.lightlevelhud.hidesafe.too: Do not show light level for blocks where mobs will not spawn
config.dshuds.lightlevelhud.indicatecaut: Indicate current light levels that will change at night which could result in mob spawns
config.dshuds.compasshud.tooltip: Options for configuring the Compass HUD
config.dshuds.compasshud.transparency.to: Transparency factor to apply when rendering the Compass HUD
config.dshuds.clockhud.tooltip: Options for configuring the Clock HUD
